name: The Rooms (ProximityGames)
description:
This is my first game and I haven't got the time to finish so I decided to end early and just ship it. I LOVE FEEDBACK SO PLEASE GIVE ME SOME I NEED IT. I'm alos disclosing the project files so anyone can see:) (https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ZOXKY0o_2JsNdlxR9e4FlbrT6-oxCQpp?usp=sha...)

THERE IS A GLITCH IN THE LAST ROOM AND YOU NEED TO USE THE ARROW KEYS TO FLIP TO THE RIGHT ONCE AND THEN PRESS ESC. SORRY FOR THIS INCONVENIENCE AS THIS IS CURRENTLY A CANCELLED PROJECT!! THANK YOU!!
